title: Corrigendum to “Role of a gitogenin-type steroidal saponin (3-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl (1 → 2)-β-d-glucopyranosyl (1 → 4)-β-d-galactopyranoside-25R, 5α-spirostane-2α,3β-diol), isolated from the leaves of Malvastrum coromandelianum in regulating thyrotoxicosis in rats” [Bioorg. Med. Chem. Lett. 26 (2016) 4804–4807]
